StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSMCRReserveUnitByOrg]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID Integer, @FiscalYear Integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT
sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID], @Organiza.onID AS Organiza.onID, 0 As SchoolCode, @FiscalYear AS FiscalYear, [ContractType], [SMCRReserveUnitName] As SMCRReserveUnitName, [E1ThruE5Popula.on], sr.[Street1] AS SMCRStreet1, sr.[Street2] AS SMCRStreet2, sr.[City] AS SMCRCity, sr.[State] AS SMCRState, sr.[ZipCode] AS SMCRZipCode,
-- POC Informa.on pc.[PointOfContactID],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) AS POCLastName, RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) AS POCFirstName, POCLegalMiddleName, pc.[Street1], pc.[Street2], pc.[City], pc.[State], pc.[ZipCode], pc.[TelephoneNumber], pc.[CellPhoneNumber], pc.[FaxNumber], pc.[EmailAddress], sr.[Remarks], sr.NumVisitsPlanned, sr.ContractGoal as NumContractGoal
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] sr LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = sr.PointOfContactID
WHERE sr.Organiza.onID = @Organiza.onID AND sr.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
